hero_subtitle: Connect the diaspora with local artisans with confidence and safety.

cards.title: Morphological information transfer
cards.description: Thanks to body scanning, measurements are standardized and directly usable by tailors, reducing errors in garment making.

cards.title: Visualization and virtual fitting
cards.description: Customers can see their clothes on a 3D avatar before finalizing the order, improving accuracy and satisfaction.

cards.title: Secure transactions
cards.description: A reliable and formalized payment system minimizes financial risks and disputes between the diaspora and artisans.

cards.title: Transparent logistic tracking
cards.description: Delivery is tracked in real time, reducing uncertainty and enhancing the overall customer experience.

cards.title: Increased customer confidence
cards.description: With assisted measurements, body modeling and virtual fitting, OSEL reduces concerns about remote clothing purchases, enhancing customer confidence.

cards.title: Simplified and secure process for the diaspora
cards.description: OSEL formalizes orders with a structured framework, transparent information, secure payment and rigorous tracking, minimizing financial risk and logistic stress.

cards.title: Visibility and access to international market for artisans
cards.description: Tailors can showcase their creations on a digital platform, build credibility via client reviews and reach customers they couldn't individually.

cards.title: Error reduction and quality improvement
cards.description: Standardized measurements, clear patterns and formalized ordering processes allow artisans to work with fewer uncertainties, reducing alterations and optimizing time and costs.

cards.title: Innovative Technology
cards.description: OSEL uses body measurement capture, 3D modeling, and virtual fitting to improve order accuracy and customer satisfaction.

cards.title: Artisanal Expertise
cards.description: Malagasy tailors bring their expertise, creativity, and artisan tradition to ensure unique, custom-made, high-quality garments.

footer.title: Join the OSEL journey
footer.description: Contribute to the development of Malagasy craftsmanship and discover unique, custom-made, high-quality creations.
